mapper.select: SELECT /* PurchaseOrderSearchMapper.searchPurchaseSequenceAndDate, 구매ID 생성을 위한 (Next) 시퀀스 값 및 현재일시 조회, 이승택/nTels, 2014-01-22 */ sq_pr_prchs_id.NEXTVAL AS nextSequence ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS nowDate FROM DUAL

SELECT /* PurchaseOrderSearchMapper.searchMonthlyPrchsCntDetail, 매 달 구매건수 조회 (쇼핑상품 구매건수 조회 용도), 이승택/nTels, 2014-04-22 */ 1 FROM ( SELECT ia.* ,COUNT(1) AS condVal FROM ( SELECT use_insd_usermbr_no AS insd_usermbr_no ,use_insd_device_id AS insd_device_id ,TO_CHAR(prchs_dt, 'YYYYMM') AS prchs_mm FROM tb_pr_prchs_dtl WHERE use_tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND use_insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND use_insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} AND prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * #{condPeriodValue}), 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60))
tenant_prod_grp_cd LIKE CONCAT(#{tenantProdGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND status_cd = 'OR000301' AND prchs_case_cd = 'OR020301' UNION ALL SELECT send_insd_usermbr_no AS insd_usermbr_no ,send_insd_device_id AS insd_device_id ,TO_CHAR(prchs_dt, 'YYYYMM') AS prchs_mm FROM tb_pr_prchs_dtl WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND send_insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND send_insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} AND prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * #{condPeriodValue}), 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60))
tenant_prod_grp_cd LIKE CONCAT(#{tenantProdGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND status_cd = 'OR000301' AND prchs_case_cd = 'OR020302' ) ia GROUP BY insd_usermbr_no ,insd_device_id ,prchs_mm HAVING COUNT(1) >= 1 ) a GROUP BY insd_usermbr_no, insd_device_id HAVING COUNT(1) = #{condPeriodValue}

SELECT /* PurchaseOrderSearchMapper.searchSktLimitCondDetail, SKT 후불 결제 제한 조건구분값 조회 (구매상세 테넌트상품그룹코드 조건), 이승택/nTels, 2014-01-22 */
COUNT(a.prchs_id) AS condVal /* 건 */ NVL(SUM(a.payment_amt), 0) AS condVal /* 금액 */
FROM ( SELECT ia.prchs_id , ib.payment_amt FROM tb_pr_prchs_dtl ia , tb_pr_payment ib WHERE ia.tenant_id = ib.tenant_id AND ia.prchs_id = ib.prchs_id AND ia.use_tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND ia.use_insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND ia.use_insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} AND ia.prchs_case_cd = 'OR020301'
ia.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * #{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전월 */ ia.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * (#{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'MM') /* 당월 */ ia.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - (#{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1), 'DD') /* 당일 */ ia.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * (#{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'YY') /* 당년 */ ia.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * #{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'YY') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YY') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전년 */ ia.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 'DD') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DD') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전일 */
AND ia.status_cd = 'OR000301' AND ib.payment_mtd_cd = 'OR000605'
ia.tenant_prod_grp_cd LIKE #{tenantProdGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
GROUP BY ia.prchs_id , ib.payment_amt UNION ALL SELECT ia.prchs_id , ib.payment_amt FROM tb_pr_prchs_dtl ia , tb_pr_payment ib WHERE ia.tenant_id = ib.tenant_id AND ia.prchs_id = ib.prchs_id AND ia.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND ia.send_insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND ia.send_insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} AND ia.prchs_case_cd = 'OR020302'
ia.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * #{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전월 */ ia.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * (#{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'MM') /* 당월 */ ia.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - (#{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1), 'DD') /* 당일 */ ia.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * (#{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'YY') /* 당년 */ ia.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * #{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'YY') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YY') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전년 */ ia.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 'DD') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DD') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전일 */
AND ia.status_cd = 'OR000301' AND ib.payment_mtd_cd = 'OR000605'
ia.tenant_prod_grp_cd LIKE #{tenantProdGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
GROUP BY ia.prchs_id , ib.payment_amt ) a

SELECT /* PurchaseOrderSearchMapper.searchSktLimitCondOnPaymentDetail, SKT 후불 결제 제한 조건구분값 조회 (결제내역 기준), 이승택/nTels, 2014-01-22 */
COUNT(tenant_id) AS condVal /* 건 */ NVL(SUM(payment_amt), 0) AS condVal /* 금액 */
FROM tb_pr_payment WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND insd_device_id = #{deviceKey}
prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * #{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전월 */ prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * (#{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'MM') /* 당월 */ prchs_dt >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - (#{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1), 'DD') /* 당일 */ prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * (#{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'YY') /* 당년 */ prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * #{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'YY') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YY') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전년 */ prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{condPeriodValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 'DD') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DD') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전일 */
AND status_cd = 'OR000301' AND payment_mtd_cd = 'OR000605'

SELECT /* PurchaseOrderSearchMapper."searchSktAmountDetail", SKT 후불 결제 금액 조회 (구매상세 테넌트상품그룹코드 조건), 이승택/nTels, 2014-01-22 */
NVL(SUM(a.payment_amt), 0) AS amount /* 금액 */
FROM tb_pr_payment a , tb_pr_prchs_dtl b WHERE a.tenant_id = b.tenant_id AND a.prchs_id = b.prchs_id AND a.moid = #{svcMangNo}
a.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * (#{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'MM') /* 당월 */ a.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * #{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전월 */ a.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - (#{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1), 'DD') /* 당일 */ a.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * (#{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'YY') /* 당년 */ a.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * #{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'YY') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YY') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전년 */ a.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 'DD') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DD') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전일 */
AND a.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND a.payment_mtd_cd = 'OR000605' AND a.status_cd = 'OR000301'
b.tenant_prod_grp_cd LIKE CONCAT(#{tenantProdGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
(b.tenant_prod_grp_cd NOT LIKE CONCAT(#{exceptTenantProdGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') OR a.tid LIKE 'TSTORE%' OR a.tid LIKE 'SKTstore%')
b.tenant_prod_grp_cd NOT LIKE CONCAT(#{exceptTenantProdGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND b.prchs_dtl_id = 1

SELECT /* PurchaseOrderSearchMapper."searchSktAmountOnPaymentDetail", SKT 후불 결제 금액 조회 (결제내역 기준), 이승택/nTels, 2014-01-22 */
NVL(SUM(payment_amt), 0) AS amount /* 금액 */
FROM tb_pr_payment WHERE moid = #{svcMangNo}
prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * (#{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'MM') /* 당월 */ prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * #{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전월 */ prchs_dt >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - (#{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1), 'DD') /* 당일 */ prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * (#{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'YY') /* 당년 */ prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * #{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'YY') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YY') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전년 */ prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 'DD') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DD') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전일 */
AND tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND payment_mtd_cd = 'OR000605' AND status_cd = 'OR000301'

SELECT /* PurchaseOrderSearchMapper."searchSktAmountDetail", SKT 후불 결제 선물수신 금액 조회, 이승택/nTels, 2014-01-22 */
NVL(SUM(a.payment_amt), 0) AS amount /* 금액 */
FROM ( SELECT ia.prchs_id , ib.payment_amt FROM tb_pr_prchs_dtl ia , tb_pr_payment ib WHERE ia.tenant_id = ib.tenant_id AND ia.prchs_id = ib.prchs_id AND ia.use_tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND ia.use_insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND ia.use_insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} AND ia.prchs_case_cd = 'OR020302'
ia.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * (#{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'MM') /* 당월 */ ia.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1 * #{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전월 */ ia.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - (#{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1), 'DD') /* 당일 */ ia.prchs_dt >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * (#{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1)), 'YY') /* 당년 */ ia.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12 * #{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}), 'YY') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YY') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전년 */ ia.prchs_dt BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{condValue, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 'DD') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DD') - (1 / (24 * 60 * 60)) /* 전일 */
AND ia.status_cd = 'OR000301' AND ib.payment_mtd_cd = 'OR000605'
ia.tenant_prod_grp_cd LIKE #{tenantProdGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
GROUP BY ia.prchs_id , ib.payment_amt ) a
